snippet.title: Body Language Proof Amber Heard Is The Worst Actor In The World Lying About Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Does body language and the evidence prove Amber Heard is actually the worst actor in the entire world, trying to lie about Johnny Depp? Find out next.

Amber Heard is the now 34 year old Hollywood actress who played in The Rum Diary, The Ward, and how could any of us forget her smash hit I Do..Until I Don’t, and as you all know, the now 57 year old Johnny Depp is a pirate.

Amber and Johnny got married on February 3, 2015, Amber filed for divorce on May 23, 2016, and the divorce was finalized on January 13, 2017. However, both Johnny and Amber claimed spousal abuse during the divorce hearings and Depp is now suing gossip magazines for libel, slander, and defamation for perpetuating the story, which greatly negatively impact his acting career.  So we’re going to break down Amber Heard’s body language during her intense deposition, along with their recorded conversations, to find out whether these accusations against Johnny Depp appear to be true or false.

Give this video a thumbs up if you think Amber Heard was lying
Give this video a thumbs down if you think Amber Heard was very truthful

Now in the comments, what would you do if you were Johnny Depp or if someone fabricated terrible lies about you? Would you sue them, would you take that false accuser down? Let everyone know in the comments below.

Remember to subscribe because we don’t want you to miss out on new body language and investigative videos that always seem to shake up YouTube, and I’ll see you at the top.

#BodyLanguage #AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp

MORE ON VIDEO: Why Amber Heard's Acting Body Language Was Just So Bad Lying About Johnny Depp
